data.title: Adolf von Menzel Online
meta_keywords: Adolf von Menzel paintings Adolf von Menzel pictures biography information gallery galleries
data.meta_description: Adolf von Menzel [German Realist Painter, 1815-1905] Guide to pictures of works by Adolf von Menzel in art museum sites and image archives worldwide.
data.text:
Adolf von Menzel Works Online

Categorized & Annotated

Commercial Galleries: Galleries: We invite you to register and list your site (no charge for this service)

Articles and Reference Sites:

Encyclopedia Britannica complete article on Adolf von Menzel

Note: The full version of the article is available only if you follow this link. If you bookmark the article and return later, or if you navigate directly to the Britannica website, you will see a 100-word preview only. Troubleshooting

RKD Netherlands Institute for Art History

Union List of Artist Names (Getty Museum)

Reference sheet with basic information about the artist and pointers to other references.

Articles and Texticles (Michael Hirsh's Blog on Art + Animation)

"Look Inside" and "Search Inside" Books at Amazon

Look Inside Books:Selections from the books listed below are scanned in, in high res. Text is clearly readable and art reproductions vary from so-so to excellent. Don't miss the fact that you can usually zoom in via the "View" drop-down menu, along the top row of Amazon's Online Reader. Search Inside Books:Same as "Look Inside", except that the entire book is scanned in, and the text is fully searchable. This is an unbelievable resource, for research and especially for previewing a book when making the decision to buy.

Note: Some "Search Inside" features are limited to people signed in to an account which has previously made a purchase at Amazon.
